Overall Positive Sentiment Percentages by Aspect

Cleanliness: 33.106 %
Amenities: 76.482 %
Location: 88.056 %
Services: 73.047 %
General: 58.347 %
Value: 55.55 %

From the data, it is evident that Cleanliness and Amenities could be improved considerably given their low percentage of positive sentiment. Similarly, Value could also be improved. Cleanliness can be improved by conducting more thorough cleaning and inspections, while Amenities can be improved by providing a greater variety of them. Location should be improved by taking measures to make it more accessible to customers. Additionally, Services can be improved by introducing more efficient service practices, and General can be improved by increasing customer engagement and satisfaction.
